description: Come discover the world of Watercolor Painting. This course is intended for anyone who's ever asked the question how do you paint that? How do you get started? I take my students step by step through topics like what Paints to use and what tools are needed. They will Master the different brush stoke techniques. Then I teach my students how to start there own painting from sizing the image to blending colors. In this video I begin to paint one of my hibiscus flowers. I just love painting them and you will too. Also we will make a very handy guide to brush strokes, people love having this guide around. And remember "You never know what you do until you try it."
title: Watercolor Painting for the Beginner
